papers.title: Progress and CW Beam Commissioning of China ADS
authors: China Accelerator Driven System (ADS) project was proposed by CAS. It includes a superconducting proton linac
and a subcritical reactor with liquid lead-bismuth coolant
and started in 2011. The project China Initiative Accelerator Driven Sub-critical System (CIADS) is approved

consists of 250 MeV linac and 10 MWt sub-critical reactor. It will be constructed in 2022. The road map and progress are introduced in the presentation. A 25 MeV Demo Linac is developing at IMP and the first 25 MeV beam will be in Sept. 2016. It consists of 35 keV ECRIS

and four cryomodules. The first three are installed with six half wave resonators and the last one is installed with six spoke resonators. To verify integral technology and commissioning of high power CW beam
a single-cavity cryomodule was developed and commissioned with ~11 mA proton beam in advance in Feb. 2015. Now
the first cryomodule with 5 MeV CW beam is commissioning
some results are presented. The progress of a 325 MHz front-end is also introduced.
